Uses of Class
jexer.menu.TMenuItem

  • Packages that use TMenuItem 
    Package Description
    jexer
    Jexer - Java Text User Interface library This library is a text-based windowing system loosely reminiscent of Borland's Turbo Vision library.
    jexer.menu
    Menu bar support classes.

    • Uses of TMenuItem in jexer

      Methods in jexer that return TMenuItem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TMenuItem TApplication.getMenuItem(int id)
      Get the menu item associated with this ID.
      Methods in jexer with parameters of type TMenuItem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TApplication.addMenuItem(TMenuItem item)
      Add a menu item to the global list.

    • Uses of TMenuItem in jexer.menu

      Subclasses of TMenuItem in jexer.menu 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TMenuSeparator
      TMenuSeparator is a special case menu item.
      class  TSubMenu
      TSubMenu is a special case menu item that wraps another TMenu.
